name: boot-env-docs
description: This package aims to help you generate documentation for Spring Boot environment variables.

scripts.node: node dist/index.js -m parseproperty -f application.yml -j records.json -o document.md
scripts.build-run: npm run build && npm run node
scripts.nodemon: nodemon src/index.ts -m parseproperty -f test.yaml -j records.json -o document.md

author: noradroid
